instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Cook the squash in boiling water for 6-7 minutes until just tender. Drain and transfer to an ovenproof dish.
Mix the tomatoes with the tomato paste and chilli, and spoon over the squash.
Mix together the grated mozzarella and fresh breadcrumbs, and sprinkle over the tomatoes. Bake for 20 minutes until golden.
